com.emc.object.s3

Class S3VHostConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.object.ObjectConfig<S3Config>
      • com.emc.object.s3.S3Config
        • com.emc.object.s3.S3VHostConfig

  • public class S3VHostConfig
extends S3Config
    This configuration uses a single named host as the endpoint and prepends namespaces and buckets as appropriate for each request. Standard virtual host configurations require signing the namespace to support cross-namespace requests. This is the default behavior of this configuration. To change this behavior to a legacy type virtual host which is isolated to the default namespace of the user, call setLegacyMode(boolean) and pass true as the argument.

    NOTE: To use virtual host configuration, you must specify your namespace or set it to null and include it in the hostname of the endpoint.
